name: Privacy Training Center
goal: The Privacy Training Center ASBL is a European non-profit organisation providing tailored privacy and data protection workshops for organisations and individuals. It also aims to serve as knowledge provider to public institutions.
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Consumer Affairs, Home Affairs, Information Society, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Research and Technology
euInitiatives: Organisation of privacy and data protection trainings for EU politicians and staff. Awareness raising for the importance of these issues.
